entry.title: Awesome Game Engine Dev Updates on Apr 08 - Apr 14, 2024
entry.content:
Libraries / F#

  • 📚 Awesome F# (⭐1.3k) - Curated list of frameworks, libraries, software and resources.
  • 🌎 F# - Functional-first language for .NET, prioritizing expressive code and parallelism.
  • F#: Audio
    • 🔒 FSound (⭐51) - Sound processing library.
  • F#: Entity Component System
    • 🎉 Garnet (⭐167) - Game composition library with ECS and actor-like messaging features.
  • F#: Game Engine w/Editor
    • 🎉 Nu Game Engine (⭐1.3k) - Cross-platform game engine built in the functional style.
  • F#: Gui
    • 🎉 Fabulous (⭐1.2k) - Declarative UI framework for cross-platform apps.

entry.title: Awesome Game Engine Dev Updates on Mar 25 - Mar 31, 2024
entry.content:
Game Engines / Commercial

  • 💸 PlayCanvas - Popular (Flappy Bird) WebGL game engine. [Awesome (⭐301) | GitHub (⭐10k)]

Game Engines / Specialty

  • 💸 DopeFish - Doom / Heretic map loading system for GameMaker.

Learning / Computer Graphics

  • Graphics API: Mantle
    • 📚 Mantle - Developed by AMD as an alternative to Direct3D and OpenGL.
  • Graphics API: Metal
    • 🌎 Metal - API for developing 3D apps on Apple platforms. [Samples]
    • 📚 Metal Tutorial - Learn how to get started with Metal at RayWenderlich.com.
  • Graphics API: WebGPU
    • 🌎 Dawn - Open source, cross-platform implementation of the WebGPU standard, by Google.
    • 🌎 WebGPU (⭐5.1k) - Next generation web 3D graphics API. [GitHub (⭐5.1k)]
    • 🌎 WebGPU Demos - Collection of simple WebGPU examples by Apple.

Learning / Engine Development

  • Commercial Studios Research Divisions
    • 🌎 Activision Research - Blog posts, articles and presentations from research within Activision.
    • 🌎 EA Technology - Research on game tech including info on the Frostbite engine.
    • 🌎 Ubisoft Technology - Learn about in-house tech including the Anvil and Snowdrop engines.

Libraries / C

  • C: Graphics - 3D
    • 🎉 Sokol Gfx (⭐8.4k) - Cross-platform, single-file graphics. [Examples]
    • 🎉 Sokol Graphics Painter (⭐517) - 2D graphics painter implemented with Sokol.
  • C: Input
    • 🎉 libGamepad (⭐24) - Cross-platform library for gamepad input.
    • 🎉 Sokol Gamepad (⭐8.4k) - Branch with addon support for gamepads in Sokol.
  • C: Math
    • 🎉 Cglm (⭐2.6k) - Highly optimized OpenGL math.
    • ⭐ Handmade Math (⭐1.4k) 🔥 - Simple, public domain math library for games and computer graphics.
    • 🎉 Kazmath (⭐531) - Math library targeted at games.
    • 🎉 Raymath (⭐27k) - Math library included in the RayLib game framework.

Libraries / C++

  • C++: File System
    • 🎉 Imgui-Filebrowser (⭐755) - Header-only file browser implementation for Dear ImGui in C++17.
  • C++: Game Engine w/Editor
    • 🎉 AnKi 3D Engine (⭐1.5k) - Vulkan backend, modern renderer, scripting, physics and more.
    • 🔒 Crown Engine (⭐2.2k) - Data-driven 3D and 2D game engine.
    • 🎉 Crystal Engine (⭐190) - Vulkan backend with PBR and styled GUI (CrystalWidgets).
    • 🎉 Drop Creator (⭐7) - No code, 2.5D game engine built with Qt, OpenGL and Chipmunk Physics.
    • 🔒 Enigma (⭐357) - GameMaker compatible 2D engine.
    • 🎉 Esoterica Engine (⭐984) - High-performance game engine with editor and AAA quality animation graph.
    • 🎉 Ethereal Engine (⭐711) - Cross-platform game engine and editor.
    • 🎉 ezEngine (⭐1.7k) - Game engine in active development.
    • 🎉 FIFE (⭐565) - Multi-platform isometric game engine.
    • 🎉 Irrlicht - Cross-platform 3D engine worked on for nearly 2 decades. [Website]
    • 🎉 Limon Engine (⭐654) - 3D FPS game engine with full dynamic lighting and shadows.
    • 🎉 Lina Engine (⭐867) - Modular game engine, aimed to develop 3D desktop games.
    • 🎉 Lumos (⭐1.4k) - Cross-platform 2D/3D game engine, supports both OpenGL and Vulkan.
    • 🎉 Lumix Engine (⭐3.6k) - A 3D game engine with Dear ImGui based editor.
    • 🎉 MxEngine (⭐1.2k) - Modern-C++ general-purpose 3D game engine.
    • 🔒 neoGFX (⭐560) - Cross-platform app and game engine.
    • 🎉 ÖbEngine (⭐840) - 2D engine with Lua scripting built with SFML.
    • 🎉 Overload (⭐2.3k) - Well documented 3D game engine inspired by industry standards.
    • 🎉 Razix Engine (⭐492) - High-performance research engine for production pipeline.
    • 🎉 Rootex (⭐225) - Advanced C++ 3D game engine powering an in-production game.
    • 🎉 Skylicht (⭐730) - Upgraded features including audio, physics and particles. Built on Irrlicht.
    • 🎉 Spartan Engine (⭐2.5k) - Emphasis on quality and performance.
    • 🎉 Torque 3D (⭐3.4k) - High-performance 3D engine built on The Forge.
    • 🔒 UPBGE (⭐1.6k) - Blender game engine, originally forked from Blender.
  • C++: Graphics - 2D
    • 🎉 Blend2D (⭐1.8k) - High-performance 2D vector graphics engine. [Website]
    • 🎉 C++ Bitmap Library (⭐175) - Featured bitmap loading and manipulation library.
    • 🎉 QNanoPainter (⭐422) - OpenGL accelerated vector drawing library for Qt, powered by NanoVG.
    • 🎉 Skia (⭐9.9k) - Complete 2D graphics library used in Chrome by Google. [Website]
    • 🎉 vg-renderer (⭐576) - 2D vector graphics renderer for Bgfx, based on ideas from NanoVG.
  • C++: Input
    • 🎉 Gainput (⭐875) - Easy to use input library.
    • 🎉 OIS (⭐266) - Object-oriented input system. Compatiable with many operating systems.
    • 🎉 Oryol Input (⭐2k) - Input module from the Oryol game framework.
  • C++: Libraries
    • 🎉 Boost Libraries - Wide range of C++ libraries, many end up as part of the STL. [Website]
    • 📚 Gamedev Libraries (⭐1.6k) - Collection of open source C/C++ libraries for game development.
    • 📚 Inqlude - List of libraries for developers of Qt-based apps.
    • 📚 List of Open Source C++ Libraries - Comprehensive list of open source C++ libraries.
    • 📚 NVIDIA GameWorks - NVIDIA technologies for game & app developers.

Libraries / C#

  • C#: Cross-Platform
    • 🌎 Blazor (⭐37k) - C# to JavaScript (as WebAssembly) technology by Microsoft. [Website]
    • 🎉 Mono (⭐11k) - Open source implementation of Microsoft's .NET Framework.
  • C#: Entity Component System
    • 🎉 Arch (⭐1.3k) - High-performance ECS with optional multithreading.
    • 🎉 DefaultEcs (⭐707) - ECS framework designed for game development.
    • 🔒 Friflo.Engine.ECS (⭐174) - Archetype based ECS with focus on performance, cache locality and DX.
    • 🎉 LeoECS (⭐199) - ECS framework powered by C# with optional integration to Unity.
  • C#: Geometry
    • 🎉 DotRecast (⭐722) - A port of Recast & Detour, navigation mesh toolset for games, Unity3D, servers, C#.

Libraries / Go

  • 🌎 Go - Statically typed, compiled programming language designed at Google. [GitHub]

Libraries / Haxe

  • Haxe: Animation
    • 🎉 Actuate (⭐159) - Flexible, fast tween library.
    • 🎉 DragonBones (⭐43) - Runtime support for DragonBones skeletal animation.
    • 🎉 Spine-Hx (⭐56) - Spine runtime for Haxe.
  • Haxe: Game Engine w/Editor
    • 🎉 Armory (⭐3.2k) - 3D game engine with full Blender integration.
    • 🎉 Away3D (⭐214) - Real-time 3D engine for OpenFL. [Website]
    • 🎉 Flixel-Studio (⭐105) - Embeddable, in-game editor for HaxeFlixel.
    • 🎉 Hide (⭐588) - Extensible IDE for the Heaps 3D graphic engine.
    • 🎉 LDtk (⭐3.7k) 🔥 - Modern, lightweight and efficient 2D level editor. [Website]
    • 🎉 Starling (⭐247) - Popular (Angry Birds) 2D game engine built on OpenFL. [Editor | Website]

Libraries / Java

  • 📚 OpenGL & GLSL Tutorials (⭐1.9k) - OpenGL / GLSL tutorials for LWJGL and libGDX.

Libraries / JavaScript

  • JavaScript: Animation
    • 🎉 Animate.css (⭐82k) - Ready-to-use, pure CSS animations. [Examples]
    • 🎉 D3.js (⭐111k) - Data-Driven Documents. Bring data to life with SVG, canvas and HTML. [Examples | Website]
    • 💸 GreenSock (⭐22k) - Robust animation toolset. [Website]
    • 🎉 Ossos (⭐451) - Web-based character animation system.
    • 🎉 React-Spring (⭐29k) - Spring physics based React animation library.
    • 🎉 Scene.js (⭐2.8k) - JavaScript & CSS timeline-based animation library.
    • 🎉 Theatre (⭐12k) - Motion design editor for the web.
    • 🎉 Tween.js (⭐10k) - Tweening engine for easy animations using Robert Penner's equations.
    • 🎉 TweenJS (⭐3.6k) - Tweening / animation library, part of the CreateJS suite.
  • JavaScript: Game Engine w/Editor
    • 🎉 A-Frame (⭐17k) - Web framework for building VR experiences. [Website]
    • 🎉 Cocos Creator (⭐8.8k) - Cross-Platform 2D/3D game creation. [Website]
    • 🎉 ct.js (⭐164) - Desktop 2D game engine, built on PixiJS.
    • 🎉 Egret (⭐4k) - Mobile game engine. [Editor (⭐151)]
    • 🎉 GDevelop (⭐15k) - Full-featured 2D game development. [Website]
    • 🎉 Impact (⭐2.1k) - Game engine for desktop and mobile browsers. [2D Level Editor]
    • 🎉 Isogenic (⭐550) - Engine with advanced multiplayer, based on Valve's multiplayer system.
    • 🎉 melonJS (⭐6.1k) - Modern 2D game engine, level editing with Tiled. [Examples | Website]
    • 🎉 microStudio (⭐1.1k) - Online game engine. Learn and practice programming.
    • 🎉 Pixelbox.js (⭐477) - Sandbox to fast-prototype 2D tile-based games. [Download]
    • 🎉 QICI Engine (⭐886) - Toolset for making games.
    • 🎉 Superpowers - Both 2D & 3D game making for indies. [Website]
    • 🎉 Taro (⭐288) - Multiplayer engine with Box2D physics, aka Moddio. [Website]

Libraries / Kotlin

  • Kotlin: Game Framework
    • 🎉 FXGL (⭐4.6k) - Game library for 2D, experimental 3D.
    • 🎉 Kool (⭐396) - Multi-platform 3D Vulkan / OpenGL graphics engine. [Examples]
    • 🎉 KTX (⭐1.4k) - Kotlin extensions for the libGDX game framework.

Libraries / Rust

  • Rust: Game Framework
    • 🎉 Ambient (⭐3.9k) - Multiplayer game engine.
    • 🎉 Amethyst (⭐8k) - Data-driven 2D/3D game engine aiming to be fast and configurable.
    • 🎉 Bevy (⭐40k) 🔥 - Refreshingly simple data-driven 2D/3D game engine. [Website]
    • 🎉 Macroquad (⭐3.9k) - Easy to use game library, heavily inspired by RayLib.

Specialty Topics / Geometry

  • Meshes
    • 📚 Geometry, Surfaces, Curves, Polyhedra - Geometry topics including meshes, shapes, textures and more.
    • 📚 Mesh Transforms - Apple's private API for manipulation of UIView meshes. [Source (⭐4)]

Specialty Topics / Network

  • 📚 Source Multiplayer Networking - Valve's Source Engine multiplayer system.

Specialty Topics / Particles

  • 📚 Particles - Article by LearnOpenGL.

Specialty Topics / Physics

  • Ropes / Chains
    • 📚 Draw SVG rope using JavaScript - SVG path vector rope drawing.
    • 📚 Ropes in Contraption Maker - Implementing the physics of ropes in Contraption Maker.
    • 🌎 Matter.js: Chains - Chains demo using Matter.js. [Source (⭐18k)]
  • Soft Body
    • 📚 Blob Physics - Using verlet physics to simulate 2D blobs.
    • 🌎 Oryol: Bullet Cloth - Bullet 3D physics cloth using the Oryol game framework. [Source (⭐82)]
    • 🌎 Three.js: Ammo Volume - 3D soft body volumes using Ammo.js and Three.js. [Source (⭐108k)]

Specialty Topics / Shaders

  • 🌎 SHADERed (⭐4.6k) - Shader IDE, written in C++.
  • Noise
    • 📚 Book of Shaders: Noise - Excellent GLSL noise article by Book of Shaders.
    • 📚 Color Banding - Using noise / dithering to improve drawing gradients.
    • 🎉 Psrdnoise (⭐291) - Tiling simplex flow noise in 2D/3D.
    • 📚 Understanding Perlin Noise - Analysis of Perlin Noise, written in C#. [Source]
    • 🎉 WebGL Noise (⭐543) - Maintained branch of the original Ashima Arts 2D, 3D and 4D noise functions.
  • Pixelation
    • 📚 Pixel Art Shaders - Useful GLSL postprocessing shaders for pixel art games.
    • 🌎 Three.js: Pixelation Example - WebGL pixelation postprocessing using Three.js. [Source (⭐108k)]
  • Water / Refraction
    • 📚 2D Water Shader - GLSL fragment shader to simulate 2D water surface in libGDX.

Specialty Topics / Transparency

  • 📚 Intro to Order-Independent Transparency - Article by LearnOpenGL.

Tools / Software / Level Editors

  • 🆓 TrenchBroom - Level editor for Quake-Engine games. [Source (⭐2.3k)]

Tools / Software / Materials / Textures

  • 🆓 TexTools for Blender - UV and texturing tools for Blender. [Source]

Tools / Software / Voxel

  • 🎉 IsoVoxel (⭐352) - Generates isometric pixel art from MagicaVoxel .vox files.

Video Game Assets / Graphic Assets

  • 🆓 Top Free Game Assets - Top free game assets listed on itch.io.

Video Game Assets / Model Assets

  • 📚 Retro3DGraphicsCollection (⭐1.7k) - No attribution, retro (PS1 style) 3D graphics assets.
entry.summary: 40 awesome projects updated on Mar 25 - Mar 31, 2024

entry.title: Awesome Game Engine Dev Updates on Nov 06 - Nov 12, 2023
entry.content:
Game Engines / Awesome Collections

  • 📚 CoolEngines (⭐88) - List of open source graphic & game engines.

Libraries / C++

  • C++: Audio
    • 🎉 Amplitude Audio SDK (⭐53) - Cross-platform audio engine designed for the needs of games.
    • 💰 irrKlang - High level 2D/3D sound engine and audio library.
    • 💰 Juce (⭐7.4k) - The leading framework for multi-platform audio apps.
    • 🔒 OpenAL Soft (⭐2.4k) - Software implementation of the OpenAL 3D audio API.
    • 🎉 PortAudio (⭐1.8k) - Cross-platform audio library.
  • C++: Physics
    • 🎉 Box2D (⭐8.9k) - Battle tested 2D physics for games. [Docs | Fixed Time-Step | Tutorials]
    • 🎉 Bullet Physics (⭐14k) - Popular 3D physics libary.
    • 🎉 Chrono (⭐2.5k) - High-performance multiphysics and multibody dynamics simulations. [Gallery]
    • 🎉 Edyn (⭐703) - Multi-threaded, networked physics engine. Supports large dynamic worlds. [Testbed (⭐39)]
    • 🎉 Jolt Physics (⭐8.1k) - Multi-core friendly rigid body 3D physics and collision detection.
    • 🎉 Liquid Fun (⭐4.8k) - Extension of Box2D, adds particle-based fluid and soft bodies. [Demos]
    • 🎉 Newton Dynamics (⭐990) - Real-time simulation of 3D environments.
    • 🎉 ODE - Open Dynamics Engine, 3D rigid body physics.
    • 🎉 Qu3e (⭐958) - Fast 3D physics engine, created to be used in games.
    • 🎉 ReactPhysics3D (⭐1.6k) - 3D physics engine.
    • 🎉 Slingshot (⭐130) - Constraint-based physics engine for 3D rigid body dynamics.

entry.title: Awesome Game Engine Dev Updates on Mar 06 - Mar 12, 2023
entry.content:
Game Engines / Popular

  • 🎉 Godot (⭐99k) 🔥 - Feature-packed, open source engine. Excellent! [Awesome (⭐8.2k) | Website]

Game Engines / AAA

  • 🎉 Amazon Lumberyard (⭐2.1k) - AAA engine integrated with AWS and Twitch. Forked from CRYENGINE.
  • 💸 CRYENGINE - Powerful real-time game development platform by Crytek.
  • 🆓 Evergine - High-quality 3D and 2D solutions. Formerly Wave Engine. [Samples (⭐130)]
  • 🎉 O3DE (⭐8.4k) - Multi-platform AAA engine. Cinema-quality 3D. Successor to Lumberyard.

Game Engines / Commercial

  • 💰 AppGameKit - Easy and quick game making by TheGameCreators.
  • 💰 Corgi Engine - 2D/2.5D platformer engine built on top of Unity.
  • 🎉 Defold (⭐5.3k) - Open sourced game engine by King. [Website]
  • 💸 Felgo - Build cross-platform 2D games in days, built with Qt.
  • 💰 GameGuru - Game builder, 3D, no coding required by TheGameCreators.
  • 💸 GameMaker Studio - Popular 2D game development environment by YoYo Games.
  • 💰 Phaser Editor 2D - Commercial, web-based editor for Phaser. [GitHub (⭐467)]

Game Engines / Specialty

  • 💰 3dSen - Emulator that lets you play NES games in 3D. [Website]
  • 🎉 GB Studio (⭐8.9k) - Retro adventure game creator for Game Boy.
  • 💰 Platforming Engine - Everything you need to create your own platformer in GameMaker.
  • 💰 RPG in a Box - Turn your stories and ideas into games, built with Godot.

Learning / Computer Graphics

  • Platform: XNA
    • 📚 RB Whitaker's Wiki - Tutorials on C#, MonoGame, XNA, and more.
    • 📚 Riemer's MonoGame Tutorials (⭐765) - Everything you need to start programming with MonoGame.
    • 📚 XNA Game Studio Archive (⭐765) 🔥 - Required visit for MonoGame / FNA / XNA developers.

Libraries / BASIC

  • BASIC: App Framework
    • 💰 Basic for Qt - BASIC language and environment built with Qt. Formerly Q7Basic.
    • 🎉 QB64 (⭐688) - Modern BASIC+OpenGL language, retains QBasic / QB4.5 compatibility.
    • 📚 Visual Basic - Object-oriented language for Windows by Microsoft.

Libraries / C

  • C: App Framework
    • 🎉 glfw (⭐14k) - Cross-platform API for windowing, graphics contexts, input and events.
    • 🎉 MiniFB (⭐1.1k) - Creates a cross-platform frame buffer for drawing pixels.
    • 🎉 SDL (⭐13k) 🔥 - Low level access to audio, keyboard, mouse, joystick, and graphics hardware.
    • 🎉 Sokol (⭐8.4k) 🔥 - Single-file libraries for graphics, windowing, file handling, audio and more.
  • C: Audio
    • ⭐ Miniaudio (⭐4.8k) - Single-file audio playback and capture library.
    • 🎉 SDL_mixer (⭐532) - Audio mixer that supports various file formats for SDL.
    • 🎉 SoLoud (⭐2k) 🔥 - Free, easy, portable audio engine for games.
  • C: Game Framework
    • 🎉 CGL (⭐441) - Single-header file, lots of graphics & utility functions.
    • 🎉 DOME (⭐482) - Melds SDL2 and the Wren scripting language. [Website]
    • 🎉 Entrypoint (⭐71) - Lightweight entry point for games.
    • ⭐ FWK (⭐517) - 3D game framework.
    • 🎉 Gunslinger (⭐1.4k) - Header-only C99 framework for multimedia apps.
    • 🎉 RayLib (⭐27k) 🔥 - Simple and easy-to-use library to enjoy 2D/3D videogame programming.
  • C: Libraries
    • ⭐ Cute Headers (⭐4.7k) - Single-file libraries primarily used for games, by Randy Gaul.
    • ⭐ Libs (⭐1.9k) - Single-file public domain libraries for C/C++, by Mattias Gustavsson.
    • ⭐ Pico Headers (⭐383) - Single-file, cross-platform libraries for game development.
    • 📚 Single-file Libs (⭐9.4k) - Amazing collection of single-file C/C++ libraries compiled from many authors.
    • ⭐ stb (⭐29k) 🔥 - Single-file public domain libraries for C/C++, by Sean Barrett.

Libraries / C++

  • 📚 Learn C++ 🔥 - Walks you through all the steps to write, compile, and debug C++.
  • C++: App Framework
    • 🎉 Cinder (⭐5.4k) - App / graphics library for macOS, Windows, Linux, iOS. [Website]
    • 🎉 Cross Window (⭐686) - Platform library for managing windows and other OS tasks.

    • 🎉 egui (⭐26k) - Easy to use immediate mode gui. Runs on web and native. [Demo]

Open Source Games / C

Open Source Games / C++

Specialty Topics / Physics

Video Game Assets / Graphic Assets

entry.title: Awesome Game Engine Dev Updates on Jan 30 - Feb 05, 2023
entry.content:
Game Engines / Popular

  • 💸 Unity - Biggest name in game engines, industry standard. [Awesome (⭐6.9k)]
  • 💸 Unreal Engine - AAA quality, insane feature set, photoreal visuals. [Awesome (⭐1.4k)]

Game Engines / AAA

  • 💸 Flax Engine (⭐6.3k) - Modern 3D game engine written in C++ and C#.

Game Engines / Commercial

  • 💸 Construct - Drag and drop game builder. [Awesome (⭐83)]
  • 💸 Luxe - 2D first engine, with a 2D/3D renderer.
  • 💸 NeoAxis (⭐210) - Versatile real-time platform for making games and apps. [Website]
  • 💸 Stencyl - Quick and easy game making with visual scripting. [GitHub (⭐201)]

Game Engines / Specialty

  • 🔒 Twine (⭐2.4k) - Tool for telling interactive, nonlinear stories.

Learning / Computer Graphics

  • Awesome Collections
    • 📚 Awesome Demoscene (⭐373) - Underground computer art culture exploring computer graphics and sound.
    • 📚 Awesome Graphics Libraries (⭐488) - Curated list of 3D graphics libraries and resources.
  • Books
    • 📚 GPU Gems - Programming techniques, tips, and tricks for real-time graphics.
    • 📚 GPU Gems 2 - Programming techniques for high-performance graphics.
    • 📚 GPU Gems 3 - Collection of state-of-the-art GPU programming examples hosted by NVIDIA.
    • 📚 Interactive Computer Graphics - Top down approach to computer graphics.
    • 📚 Physically-Based Rendering - From the Academy Award winning authority on PBR.
  • Education Portals
    • 📚 Game Art Tricks - Articles exploring different graphics techniques.
    • 📚 Lighthouse3d.com - Collection of tutorials on OpenGL, GLSL and other graphics topics.
    • 📚 Paper Bug - Indexed compendium of graphics programming papers.
    • 📚 Scratchapixel - In depth coverage of computer graphics topics.
  • Graphics API: Glide
    • 📚 Glide - Developed by 3dfx Interactive for their Voodoo Graphics in the 1990's.
    • 🌎 Glide Open Source Project - Glide open source project.
  • Pipeline: GPGPU
    • 🌎 CUDA - Developed by NVIDIA for parallel computing and programming.
    • 📚 DirectCompute - Developed by Microsoft for using compute shaders with DirectX 10 & 11.
    • 🌎 OpenCL - For writing programs that execute across CPUs, GPUs, and other processors.

Learning / Graphical User Interface

  • 📚 List of Widget Toolkits - Gui frameworks across all platforms and languages.

Learning / Programming

  • 📚 TIOBE Index - Popularity of programming languages, updated monthly.

Libraries / BASIC

    • 🎉 Octasphere (⭐910) - Generates triangle meshes for spheres, boxes, and capsules. [Info]
    • 🎉 Par_Shapes (⭐910) - Triangle meshes including solids, spheres and more. [Info]
    • 🎉 Par_Streamlines (⭐910) - Triangulating thick lines, béziers, streamlines. [Demo (⭐32) | Info]
  • C: Graphics - 2D
    • 🎉 NanoVG (⭐5.4k) - OpenGL-based 2D vector drawing library for UI and visualizations.
    • 🎉 Tilengine (⭐947) - 2D graphics with raster effects for retro style game development.
  • C: Gui
    • 🎉 cImgui (⭐1.7k) - Thin C wrapper generated for Dear ImGui.
    • 🎉 lvgl (⭐20k) 🔥 - Embedded gui library, many widgets and advanced visual effects.
    • 🎉 NAppGUI (⭐593) - Professional, well documented SDK to build desktop apps.

  • C++: File Formats

Specialty Topics / Fluid / Smoke

  • 🔒 Fluids-2D - Real-time fluid dynamics on the GPU with the help of WebGL and Three.js. [Source (⭐442)]

Specialty Topics / Geometry

  • CSG (Constructive Solid Geometry)
    • 📚 Constructive Solid Geometry - Technique using boolean operations to combine primitive objects.

  • Smoothing
    • 📚 Laplacian Smoothing - Draft notes with C++ code for laplacian smoothing of meshes.
    • 📚 Subdivision at Matt's Webcorner - Smoothing with subdivision surfaces.
    • 📚 Subdivision Surfaces - Explanations of different schemes used in subdivision surfaces.

Specialty Topics / Hair

    • 🌎 Threex Volumetric Spotlight - Great example of volumetric lighting with Three.js. [Source (⭐131)]

Specialty Topics / Particles

  • 📚 Game Physics from Scratch - Starting resource for game physics.

    • 📚 Making a Verlet Physics Engine - Under the hood of a 2D physics engine in JavaScript.

Specialty Topics / Shaders

  • 🎉 CrossShader (⭐299) - Cross-compiling shaders between GLSL, HLSL, Metal, and more. [Online Tool]

  • 📚 Ronja Tutorials - Tutorials covering many shader techniques.

  • 🌎 Shadertoy - Build and share shaders online.
  • Bloom

  • Lines
    • 📚 Drawing Lines - Techniques for 2D/3D line rendering.
  • Outlines
    • 🌎 Fast Solid 2D Outline - Drawing an outline on the alpha channel of a 2D image.
    • 📚 Let it glow! - Article with shader code on dynamically adding outlines to characters.
    • 🎉 Outline Shader - Nice outline shader. [Source (⭐90)]
    • 📚 Outlines w/Surface IDs - Technique combining depth, normals and surface IDs. [Source (⭐399)]
    • 📚 Sketchy Outling - Article on producing a sketchy outline look.
  • Postprocessing
    • 📚 Image Editor Effects - WebGL image filters / effects shaders. [Source (⭐100)]

Specialty Topics / Signed Distance Fields

  • 📚 2D SDFs - Signed distance functions for basic 2D primitives.
  • 📚 3D SDFs - Signed distance functions for basic 3D primitives.
  • 📚 CSG w/SDFs - Using circular SDFs to build 3D objects with CSG. [Source (⭐90)]

Specialty Topics / Tiling

  • 📚 Auto-Tile - How to use tile bitmasking to auto-tile your level layouts.
  • 📚 Space-Filling Polyhedron - Polyhedra, 3D polygons that fill space. [5 Space-Filling Polyhedra]

Specialty Topics / Transparency

  • 📚 Depth Peeling - Method for order-independent transparency.
  • 📚 Weighted, Blended - Method for order-independent transparency.

Tools / Software / 2D Game Dev

  • 🆓 ShoeBox - Drag & drop tools for sprite sheets, bitmap fonts, texture ripping, tile maps and more.

Tools / Software / Audio Tools

    • 🆓 Ardour - Record, edit, and mix. [Source (⭐4.3k)]

    • 🆓 LMMS 🔥 - Cross-platform music production software. [Source (⭐8.8k)]
    • 🆓 PixiTracker - Quickly create musical sketches, chiptunes and sound experiments.
    • 🆓 Sound Box - Compose synthetic music in your browser, good for small demos. [Source (⭐434)]
    • 🆓 SunVox - Powerful modular synthesizer with pattern-based sequencer (tracker).
    • 🆓 ZzFXM - Music generator for use in tiny JavaScript apps. [Source (⭐452)]
  • Sound Effects
    • 🆓 Bfxr - Classic. For making simple sound effects for games. [Source (⭐1k)]
    • 🆓 ChipTone - Tool for generating sound effects.
    • 💸 sfxia - Tiny sound generator.
    • 🆓 ZzFX - Tiny JavaScript sound FX system / Zuper Zmall Zound Zynth. [Source (⭐621)]

Tools / Software / Color / Palettes

  • 🌎 Coolors - Fast color palette generator.

Tools / Software / Generative Art

  • Imaging
    • 💸 DALL·E - Create realistic images from natural language.
    • 🆓 Disco Diffusion - Notebooks, models and techniques for AI art and animations.[Source (⭐7.5k)]
    • 💸 Midjourney - Image generation accessed through Discord.
    • 💸 Replicate - Run open source models with a cloud API.
    • 💸 Stable Diffusion (⭐71k) - Latent text-to-image diffusion model.

Tools / Software / Image Editors

  • 🆓 GIMP - GNU Image Manipulation Program, open source image editor. [Source (⭐5.5k)]
  • 🆓 Photopea - Capable online photo editor.

Tools / Software / Level Editors

  • 🆓 Radiant - Cross-platform level editor for idTech games. [Source (⭐618)]

Tools / Software / Materials / Textures

  • 🆓 ArmorLab - Generate PBR materials by drag & dropping your photos. [Source (⭐170)]

  • 🆓 Materialize - Tool for creating materials from images to be used in games. [Source (⭐1.6k)]
  • 🆓 TexaTool - Online tool to generate tileable textures by moving sliders.
  • 🆓 Texgen.js - JavaScript texture generator tool. [Source (⭐1.8k)]

Tools / Software / Modeling Tools

    • 🔒 - Copyleft License (CC, GPL, LGPL, MPL, etc.)
    • ❓ - Unknown License
  • Asset / Service / Tool
    • 🆓 - Free
    • 💰 - Paid
    • 💸 - Partially Free
  • Other
    • 📚 - Article, Blog, Collection, List, Tutorial(s)
    • 🔥 - Hot! Amazing Resource!
    • 🌎 - Website
entry.summary: 197 awesome projects updated on Jan 30 - Feb 05, 2023

entry.title: Awesome Game Engine Dev Updates on Jan 09 - Jan 15, 2023
entry.content:
Game Engines / Awesome Collections

  • 📚 Wikipedia: List of Game Engines - Game engines along with their platforms and licenses.

Game Engines / AAA

  • 💰 C4 Engine - Modern console engine.
  • 💰 Gamebryo - Complete toolset, flexible workflow, rapid prototyping.
  • 💸 Unigine - Real-time 3D engine. Photorealistic graphics, large virtual worlds, C++ and C# API.

Game Engines / Commercial

  • 💸 Buildbox - Create 3D & 2D video games without coding.
  • 💸 GameSalad - Sophisticated visual programming interface.
  • 💸 MANU - Unique animation system helps you create games without coding.
  • 💸 Roblox - Create immersive 3D experiences with Lua scripting.
